task.title: DCP queues (UI)
task.shortdesc: UPR queues provide information about the Database Change Protocol (DCR) protocol used to stream data changes to buckets.

context.p: The UPR queues information is available for each node via the Server Nodes tab.

step.cmd: Navigate to Server Nodes > node link.
Click on the node link (rather than expanding the triangle).
Expand the UPR QUEUES module triangle.
Hover over the UPR information for a description of the bucket analytics.
Expand the bucket analytics module triangle to show the information by server.
